Scientist/Nightlight:

"In fact, two of them were able to destroy one of co=
mmon factories... with a amazing lost of lives... the next strike may be bi=
gger"said with anger the scientst while he left alone the two bots.

"Rodim=
us"said with sadness the femme while she walked towards Rodimus"Elita isn't=
 in the craft... I was afraid that we couldn't survive the crash and I set =
her in a pod, that was released before our crash... The only way to find th=
e pod is using a Maximal sigature, I haven't said anything to anyone 'cause=
 I don't know if we can trust in watchers... Still, I don't sure if we can =
trust them..."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard Allen 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, August 27, 2005 7:54 PM
  Subjec=
t: Re: Watchers' CRs


  : : Rodimus Prime : :
  Rodimus Prime: I should ex=
amine our craft, maybe Elita was hiding.

  While Roddy waited for Nightlig=
ht's input he thought about the factions on Earth.

  Rodimus Prime: So you=
 Watchers stay out of the petty Maximal/Predacon conflicts and observe, wai=
ting for anything from Unicron and the Minions?
